      • findFirst

        @Deprecated
public Node findFirst(String pattern)
        Deprecated. Since 2.0.4. This method is not very interesting.
        That methods looks for the pattern and returns the first matching node. It is now deprecated since there are no use case for it. Use instead findFirst(String, boolean) which will fail if two artifacts match the pattern.

      • findFirst

        public Node findFirst(String pattern,
             boolean stopIfNotUnique)

        public Node addRootNode(org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject pom)
        Add a root node given a Maven Project POM. This can be used to initialize the graph.

      • tryResolutionOnLocalBaseVersion

        protected void tryResolutionOnLocalBaseVersion(org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact,
                                   org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException e)
                                        throws org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
        Try to locally resolve an artifact with its "unique" version.
        Parameters:
        artifact - Artifact to resolve with its unique version
        e - ArtifactNotFoundException originally thrown
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException - If alternate resolution failed.
        Since:
        1.11.1
        See Also:
        Artifact.getBaseVersion()
